title: Bandwagonesque - 1980s stylee inline face
content:
I've finally managed to shake off using Century Gothic [just, ish] but I'm afer the "1986" face here: [http://creattica.com/logos/1986/27205](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823090331/http:/creattica.com/logos/1986/27205 "http://creattica.com/logos/1986/27205")

Well aware it's probably not a font, but anything close on the letterforms would be appreciated.

Cheers,

s
author: nert

comments.content: Avant Garde Bold looks closer than any of the Century Gothics - except for the '1'

If you are looking for the numerals my suggestion is to outline a solid font, such as [La Moda](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823090331/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/la-moda-nf/) from Nick Curtis.

- Mike Yanega
